pr_title: chore(repo): root cleanup (move loose files into canonical folders)

moves.reason: GitHub branch protection config snapshot; architecture documentation, not tooling.
Dev server configuration; no tooling requires it at root.
Claude agent bridge config; belongs in .claude/ tool directory.
Application ship manifest; not a root convention file.
Figma Code Connect config; belongs with other Figma tooling in figma/.
Figma Make dev config; belongs with other Figma tooling in figma/.

security.reason: Duplicate of .env.prod; contained hardcoded production credentials. Added to .gitignore.
security.note: Credentials already in git history. Rotate POSTGRES_PASSWORD and ODOO_ADMIN_PASSWORD.
